Bevel Electric Shave Essentials Kit
Sale price$89.95

COOLNESS WITHOUT THE STING.

Keep your skin happy with the refreshing coolness of our Post-Shave Balm. This lotion helps reduce shave irritation by using Tea Tree Oil and Witch Hazel to soothe and calm your skin instantly. Lactic and Salicylic Acids help exfoliate and even your complexion, while Shea Butter helps moisturize and reduce blemishes.

FOR BEST USE

After shaving, massage a nickel-sized amount onto all shaved areas. On the days you do not shave, use nightly for maintenance and restoration.

KEY INGREDIENTS

  • Tea Tree Oil - Protects against infection and irritation while providing a soothing cooling effect post shave.
  • Jojoba Oil - Easily absorbs without clogging the pores, providing all day moisturization.
  • Oat Kernel - A rich anti-aging extract that safeguards sensitive skin from irritants and inflammation.
  • Salicylic & Lactic Acid - Promotes the shedding of dead skin cells, opens clogged pores, all while neutralizing bacteria within to reduce dark spots. - Easily absorbs without clogging the pores, providing all day moisturization.

MADE WITHOUT

Alcohol, Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates, Dyes, Silicones, Artificial Fragrances.

Full Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Panthenol, Menthol, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate, Allantoin, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dimethicone, Bisabolol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Bark/Leaf/Twig Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Polysorbate 20, Cetyl Alcohol, Laureth-4, Stearic Acid, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Laureth-7, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Triethanolamine, Fragrance.
